nodes.text: Bioniip Laboratories was a company located in Cloud City, Bespin that manufactured cybernetic technology and Bio-implants.

Bioniip Laboratories was created for Star Wars Legends continuity, making its debut in the 1989 adventure book, Crisis on Cloud City, written by Christopher Kubasik for the first edition of Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. Bioniip Laboratories was integrated into the Canon when it was featured as a map included in the downloadable expansion pack, Bespin, for the 2015 video game Star Wars Battlefront.
